CutSceneText.Text: Maybe you remember these? They are the boots you left behind...
Mother kept them. She said they were a token of love...from you.
She...the owner of the general store?
Oh father, I missed you so...
Well, this is...I need to think about this, you understand.
I am sorry, my...daughter. Leave me alone for just a little?
I just need time to think all this through.
Well, I will leave you for now....
But please father, don't think too long...
